#California Focus Tree by Lifey
#All suggestions should be sent to Lifey#0001 on Discord.
#Do not edit.

focus_tree = {
	id = california_focus
	country = {
		factor = 0
		modifier = {
			add = 10
			tag = CAC
		}
	}
	continuous_focus_position = { x = 150 y = 2700 }
	default = no

	focus = {
		id = CAC_politicalstate
		icon = GFX_goal_generic_national_unity
		cost = 1.00
		x = 19
		y = 0
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 75
		}
		cancel_if_invalid = yes
		continue_if_invalid = no
		available_if_capitulated = yes
			available = {
					date > 1936.02.23
				}
			completion_reward = {
					CAC = {
							country_event = california.1
						}
					set_country_flag = CAC_electedpresident
				}

	}
	focus = {
		id = CAC_psadepartmentofdefense
		icon = GFX_focus_usa_recruit_the_free_corps
		cost = 7.25
		x = 19
		y = 13
			available = {
					has_completed_focus = CAC_formationofpsa
				}
			completion_reward = {
					add_ideas = CAC_newlyformedarmedforces
					add_ideas = CAC_newnavy
					add_ideas = CAC_newlyformedairforce
				}

	}
	focus = {

					remove_ideas = CAC_newlyformedairforce
					add_ideas = CAC_airforceofthepsa
				}

	}
	focus = {
		id = CAC_armylloydsway6
		icon = GFX_goal_generic_army_artillery2
		cost = 10.00
		prerequisite = {
			focus = CAC_armylloydsway4
		}
		x = 1
		y = 12
			completion_reward = {
					add_ideas = CAC_advancedartillery
				}

	}

	focus = {
		id = CAC_airbaseexpansion
		icon = GFX_goal_generic_air_production
		cost = 10
		prerequisite = {
			focus = CAC_genericindustry10
		}
		x = 1
		y = 4
		completion_reward = {
			797 = {
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
					add_building_construction = {
						type = air_base
						level = 3
						instant_build = yes
					}
			}
			797 = {
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
					add_building_construction = {
						type = arms_factory
						level = 1
						instant_build = yes
					}
			}
	}
	}


	focus = {
		id = CAC_militaryroads
		icon = GFX_goal_generic_construct_infrastructure
		cost = 10

			focus = CAC_airbaseexpansion
		}

			has_war = yes

		completion_reward = {
			974 = {
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
					add_building_construction = {
						type = infrastructure
						level = 3
						instant_build = yes
					}
			}
			798 = {
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
					add_building_construction = {
						type = infrastructure
						level = 3
						instant_build = yes
					}
			}

			799 = {
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
					add_building_construction = {
						type = infrastructure
						level = 3
						instant_build = yes
					}
			}

				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
					add_building_construction = {
						type = infrastructure
						level = 3
						instant_build = yes
					}
			}
	}
	}


	focus = {
		id = CAC_assassinatecommunists
		icon = GFX_CAC_assassinatecommunists
		cost = 10.00

		available = {
			has_country_flag = CAC_sinclaircontestedelections
		}

		prerequisite = {
			focus = CAC_statecontrolledmedia
		}
		x = 11
		y = 4
			completion_reward = {
					country_event = california.22
					custom_effect_tooltip = california_james_assassinate
				}

	}

	focus = {
		id = CAC_extendpresidentalpowers
		icon = GFX_focus_generic_treaty
		cost = 10.00

		available = {
				has_country_flag = CAC_assassinationsuccess

			focus = CAC_assassinatecommunists
		}
		x = 11

	#ending focus tree bracket DO NOT put focuses past this line
